entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
